languages.text: "Я не стану санкционировать чудовищное попрание Лекс Империалис". {n}Соломон упрямо выпячивает подбородок.{/n} "В вашей власти похитить десятину, но последствия неизбежны — подобное преступление не утаишь, и Адептус Арбитес потребуют ответа. Я не смог вас образумить — рассчитываю, что у маршала получится переубедить вас".

"I will not authorise such a heinous violation of the Lex Imperialis." {n}Solomorne stubbornly juts out his chin.{/n} "It is within your power to plunder the tithe, but the consequences will be inevitable. Such a transgression cannot be concealed, and the Adeptus Arbites will demand answers. I have failed to convince you, but I trust the Marshal will change your mind."
languages.original_text: "Я не стану санкционировать чудовищное попрание Лекс Империалис". {n}Соломон упрямо выпячивает подбородок.{/n} "В вашей власти похитить десятину, но последствия неизбежны — подобное преступление не утаишь, и Адептус Арбитес потребуют ответа. Я не смог вас образумить — рассчитываю, что у маршала получится переубедить вас".

Such a transgression cannot be concealed, and the Adeptus Arbites will demand answers. I have failed to convince you, but I trust the Marshal will change your mind."

Such a transgression cannot be concealed, and the Adeptus Arbites will demand answers. I have failed to convince you, but I trust the Marshal will change your mind."

"I will not authorise such a heinous violation of the Lex Imperialis." {n}Solomorne stubbornly juts out his chin.{/n} "It is within your power to plunder the tithe, but the consequences will be inevitable. Such a transgression cannot be concealed, and the Adeptus Arbites will demand answers. I have failed to convince you, but I trust the Marshal will change your mind."

"I will not authorise such a heinous violation of the Lex Imperialis." {n}Solomorne stubbornly juts out his chin.{/n} "It is within your power to plunder the tithe, but the consequences will be inevitable. Such a transgression cannot be concealed, and the Adeptus Arbites will demand answers. I have failed to convince you, but I trust the Marshal will change your mind."

languages.text: "Ich werde ein so ruchlose Verletzung des Lex Imperia nicht autorisieren." {n}Solomorne reckt störrisch sein Kinn vor.{/n} "Es steht in Eurer Macht, den Zehnt zu plündern, aber die Konsequenzen wären unausweichlich. Ein derartiges Vergehen kann nicht vertuscht werden und das Adeptus Arbites wird Antworten verlangen. Ich konnte Euch nicht überzeugen, hoffe aber, dass Euch der Marschall umstimmen wird."
languages.original_text: "I will not authorise such a heinous violation of the Lex Imperialis." {n}Solomorne stubbornly juts out his chin.{/n} "It is within your power to plunder the tithe, but the consequences will be inevitable. Such a transgression cannot be concealed, and the Adeptus Arbites will demand answers. I have failed to convince you, but I trust the Marshal will change your mind."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde ein so ruchlose Verletzung des Lex Imperia nicht autorisieren." {n}Solomorne reckt störrisch sein Kinn vor.{/n} "Es steht in Eurer Macht, den Zehnt zu plündern, aber die Konsequenzen wären unausweichlich. Ein derartiges Vergehen kann nicht vertuscht werden und das Adeptus Arbites wird Antworten verlangen. Ich konnte Euch nicht überzeugen, hoffe aber, dass Euch der Marschall umstimmen wird."

languages.text: « Je ne permettrai pas une violation aussi scandaleuse de la Lex Imperialis, {n}déclare Solomorne en redressant le menton d'un air obstiné.{/n} Vous avez effectivement le pouvoir de voler la dîme, mais vous ne pourrez pas vous soustraire aux conséquences de cet acte. Il est impossible de dissimuler une telle transgression et l'Adeptus Arbites exigera des réponses. Même si je n'ai pas réussi à vous convaincre, je suis sûr que le maréchal saura vous faire entendre raison. »
languages.original_text: "I will not authorise such a heinous violation of the Lex Imperialis." {n}Solomorne stubbornly juts out his chin.{/n} "It is within your power to plunder the tithe, but the consequences will be inevitable. Such a transgression cannot be concealed, and the Adeptus Arbites will demand answers. I have failed to convince you, but I trust the Marshal will change your mind."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne permettrai pas une violation aussi scandaleuse de la Lex Imperialis, {n}déclare Solomorne en redressant le menton d'un air obstiné.{/n} Vous avez effectivement le pouvoir de voler la dîme, mais vous ne pourrez pas vous soustraire aux conséquences de cet acte. Il est impossible de dissimuler une telle transgression et l'Adeptus Arbites exigera des réponses. Même si je n'ai pas réussi à vous convaincre, je suis sûr que le maréchal saura vous faire entendre raison. »

languages.text: “这是在公然违背帝国律法，我绝对不会允许如此令人发指的恶行。”{n}索罗蒙固执地扬起了头。{/n}“你确实有能力夺走神圣什一税，但这种行为必定会带来后果。你无法掩盖你的违法行为，帝国法务部也必定会要求你进行解释。虽然我说服不了你，但我相信元帅会改变你的想法。”
languages.original_text: "I will not authorise such a heinous violation of the Lex Imperialis." {n}Solomorne stubbornly juts out his chin.{/n} "It is within your power to plunder the tithe, but the consequences will be inevitable. Such a transgression cannot be concealed, and the Adeptus Arbites will demand answers. I have failed to convince you, but I trust the Marshal will change your mind."

traits.locale_text: “这是在公然违背帝国律法，我绝对不会允许如此令人发指的恶行。”{n}索罗蒙固执地扬起了头。{/n}“你确实有能力夺走神圣什一税，但这种行为必定会带来后果。你无法掩盖你的违法行为，帝国法务部也必定会要求你进行解释。虽然我说服不了你，但我相信元帅会改变你的想法。”

languages.text: «No autorizaré una violación tan descarada de la Lex Imperialis». {n}Solomorne levanta la barbilla, tozudo.{/n} «Tiene poder para saquear el diezmo, pero las consecuencias serán inevitables. Es imposible ocultar esa transgresión, y el Adeptus Arbites exigirá respuestas. No he conseguido convencerl{mf|e|a}, pero confío en que el Mariscal pueda hacerlo».
languages.original_text: "I will not authorise such a heinous violation of the Lex Imperialis." {n}Solomorne stubbornly juts out his chin.{/n} "It is within your power to plunder the tithe, but the consequences will be inevitable. Such a transgression cannot be concealed, and the Adeptus Arbites will demand answers. I have failed to convince you, but I trust the Marshal will change your mind."

traits.locale_text: «No autorizaré una violación tan descarada de la Lex Imperialis». {n}Solomorne levanta la barbilla, tozudo.{/n} «Tiene poder para saquear el diezmo, pero las consecuencias serán inevitables. Es imposible ocultar esa transgresión, y el Adeptus Arbites exigirá respuestas. No he conseguido convencerl{mf|e|a}, pero confío en que el Mariscal pueda hacerlo».

languages.text: 「私はそのような重大なレックス・インペリアの違反を許可しません」{n}ソロモーンは頑固に顎を突き出した。{/n}「あなたには租税を略奪する力が十分にあるが、その結果は避けられません。そんな違反は隠し通せず、高等裁定局は説明を求めるでしょう。私の説得は失敗しましたが、将帥があなたの考えを変えると信じています」
languages.original_text: "I will not authorise such a heinous violation of the Lex Imperialis." {n}Solomorne stubbornly juts out his chin.{/n} "It is within your power to plunder the tithe, but the consequences will be inevitable. Such a transgression cannot be concealed, and the Adeptus Arbites will demand answers. I have failed to convince you, but I trust the Marshal will change your mind."

traits.locale_text: 「私はそのような重大なレックス・インペリアの違反を許可しません」{n}ソロモーンは頑固に顎を突き出した。{/n}「あなたには租税を略奪する力が十分にあるが、その結果は避けられません。そんな違反は隠し通せず、高等裁定局は説明を求めるでしょう。私の説得は失敗しましたが、将帥があなたの考えを変えると信じています」

languages.text: "Lex İmperialis'in böylesine iğrenç bir şekilde ihlal edilişine onay vermeyeceğim." {n}Solomorne, inatla çenesini öne çıkarıyor.{/n} "Aşarı yağmalamak gücünüz dâhilinde olabilir ancak bunun kaçınılmaz birtakım sonuçları olur. Böyle bir suç gizlenemez, Adeptus Arbites bunun hesabını soracaktır. Sizi ikna edemedim ama Miralay'ın fikrinizi değiştireceğine güveniyorum."
languages.original_text: "I will not authorise such a heinous violation of the Lex Imperialis." {n}Solomorne stubbornly juts out his chin.{/n} "It is within your power to plunder the tithe, but the consequences will be inevitable. Such a transgression cannot be concealed, and the Adeptus Arbites will demand answers. I have failed to convince you, but I trust the Marshal will change your mind."

traits.locale_text: "Lex İmperialis'in böylesine iğrenç bir şekilde ihlal edilişine onay vermeyeceğim." {n}Solomorne, inatla çenesini öne çıkarıyor.{/n} "Aşarı yağmalamak gücünüz dâhilinde olabilir ancak bunun kaçınılmaz birtakım sonuçları olur. Böyle bir suç gizlenemez, Adeptus Arbites bunun hesabını soracaktır. Sizi ikna edemedim ama Miralay'ın fikrinizi değiştireceğine güveniyorum."
